title: Unable to connect to the login queue
body: I try to login but it says 'Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here and if it looks good, follow the guide here' I did both, followed every step, tried reinstalling and i still cant login. What should I do?

replies.body: Were you going through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)? If not make sure to give those steps a try as well, and if nothing seems to be helping go ahead and reach out to our techies in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
